Overlord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Timelord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Anubis.en:
FFmpeg errors on MacOS

Fixed

  • The FFMpeg binary is now signed and will not throw a security error when installing on MacOS

Rubberhose3.en:
Bend realism / authentication

Changed

  • New hose rigs will be set to 100% Realism for Path to Hose, RubberRig, and RubberPin for more faithful reproduction of the design. New Rubberhose will still respect the Realism setting.

Fixed

  • Computers being logged multiple times when on a VPN or corporate network

Rubberhose2.en:
Final build for v2

Rubberhose lives on in v3. Rubberhose 3
